<!--StartFragment-->

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#202020;mso-font-kerning:0pt">我小时候在农村长大，
高中才搬到小镇里， 上大学之前根本就没有接触过计算机， 后来我看到一些牛人的回忆说小时候玩什么学习机，<span lang="EN-US">10</span>几岁就开始学编程，用<span lang="EN-US">Basic </span>写程序， 学<span lang="EN-US">PASCAL</span>参加编程比赛， 我心里就很羡慕： 人和人的差距可真大啊。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:24.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#202020;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">1</span><span style="font-size:24.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:
微软雅黑;color:#202020;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、让人怀疑的<span lang="EN-US">C </span>语言<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#202020;mso-font-kerning:0pt">上大学之后学的第一门语言就是<span lang="EN-US">C </span>，学了一个学期， 沮丧的发现， 连个图形界面的程序都写不了， 净是些基于命令行的小程序。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#202020;mso-font-kerning:0pt">有天晚上，
我听着<span lang="EN-US">winamp </span>（估计<span lang="EN-US">70</span>，<span lang="EN-US">80</span>后才知道道这个古老的<span lang="EN-US">mp3</span>软件）中播放着<span lang="EN-US">Beyond</span>的歌， 在<span lang="EN-US">Turbo C</span>里敲完了一段链表的小程序， 走出宿舍，仰望星空，突然间对计算机业产生了深深的怀疑：这玩意儿到底能干啥？<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#202020;mso-font-kerning:0pt">当时确实是井底之蛙，不知道写图形界面程序，掌握了<span lang="EN-US">Windows GUI</span>编程即可， 更何况<span lang="EN-US">Visual Basic </span>，<span lang="EN-US">Delphi </span>工具已经出现，可以快速开发<span lang="EN-US">GUI</span>程序。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#202020;mso-font-kerning:0pt">这其实反映了一个大问题：
什么语言适合入门？<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#202020;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">C</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:
微软雅黑;color:#202020;mso-font-kerning:0pt">语言贴近硬件，直接操作内存，无比强大，是编写系统级软件的不二之选， 但是真的适合入门吗？<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#202020;mso-font-kerning:0pt">由于太底层，刚接触计算机的学生也不能写操作系统，数据库，中间件等系统级软件，
哪怕一个简单的，粗糙的也很难。 只能写一点数据结构相关的小程序，再加上被指针不断的蹂躏摧残，很容易丧失斗志。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#202020;mso-font-kerning:0pt">蔡学镛在《编程<span lang="EN-US">ING</span>》一书中给出了一张图，我很喜欢：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 32pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#202020;
